    • Uses of Relation in greenmirror

      Methods in greenmirror that return Relation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @NonNull Relation Relation.clone() 
      @NonNull Relation Relation.fromRelation(@NonNull Relation originalRelation)
      Applies all properties of originalRelation.
      Relation Node.getPlacementRelation() 
      Relation Node.getRelation(int direction, @NonNull String relationName)
      Returns a specific Relation.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.passToNextNodeA(@NonNull NodeList nodes)
      Removes this relation from the current node A and passes it on to the next one in the list.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.passToNextNodeB(@NonNull NodeList nodes)
      Does exactly the same as passToNextNodeA(NodeList), but with node B.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setName(String name) 
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setNextNodeA(@NonNull NodeList nodes)
      Sets node A to the next node in the list of nodes.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setNextNodeB(@NonNull NodeList nodes)
      Sets node B to the next node in the nodes list.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setNextPlacement(Placement... placements)
      Sets the placement to the next in the list of placements.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setNodeA(Node node)
      Sets the starting node of this directional relation.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setNodeB(Node node) 
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setPlacement(@NonNull Placement placement)
      sets the placement of node A on node B.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setRigid(boolean rigid) 
      @NonNull Relation Relation.setTemporaryFxOfNodeA(@NonNull FxWrapper fx)
      Sets the temporary FX of node A.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a Relation to multiple Nodes.
      @NonNull Node Node.addRelation(@NonNull Relation relation)
      Adds a Relation to this Node and the Node on the other end.
      @NonNull Relation Relation.fromRelation(@NonNull Relation originalRelation)
      Applies all properties of originalRelation.
      boolean Node.hasRelation(Relation relation)
      Check if this node has a specific Relation.

    • Uses of Relation in greenmirror.client

      Methods in greenmirror.client with parameters of type Relation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Uses of Relation in greenmirror.client.modelinitializers

      Methods in greenmirror.client.modelinitializers with parameters of type Relation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.addRelation(@NonNull Relation relation)
      Adds a Relation to the controller and the visualizer.
      void GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.addRelations(Relation... relations)
      Adds multiple Relations.
      void GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.removeRelation(Relation relation)
      Removes a Relation from the visualizer.
      void GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.removeRelations(Relation... relations)
      Removes all passed Relations from the visualizer.
      void GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.switchPlacementRelation(@NonNull Relation newRelation)
      This is a synonym of GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.addRelation(Relation), because GreenMirrorGroovyBaseScript.addRelation(Relation) replaces the placement relation if the passed relation also is a placement relation.
